answerText: Cameron Frye[10] A plausible theory is that the end of this Scorsese movie is actually the main character's fantasy. In it, the Robert De Niro-played Travis Bickle rescues the child prostitute Iris and is treated as a hero.
heading: DEES |2014 | McGill + Penn B | 3 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Answer questions about some fan theories about movies, [10] One theory is that the title character of Ferris Bueller's Day Off and his girlfriend Sloane are imaginary friends of this character, who wears a Red Wings jersey and wrecks his dad's Ferrari.
